tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Deepa is an amazing paedetrician. I am lucky to have been consulting her for my baby. She is extremely patient, explains every point clearly and gives a lot of time to us and our baby. She is so empathetic that as a parent of a premature baby (34 weeks), I felt very assured and confident to do the right thing for my baby. She treats your baby as hers and celebrates every milestone. Her tone is always very encouraging. A breastfeeding friendly paedetrician, she is well versed with international standards and yet has no airs... Her qualities of humility, professionalism and patience are rare to find in doctors nowadays.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor speaks in a way, which feels that we know her from a very long time. Moreover, she listens with patience to each & everything that we have to say.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor asked relevant questions and was very calm as our kid had high temperature. She diagnosed very well and gave the proper reasons for perscribing the antibiotics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Deepa is very caring and handles the babies with a lot of affection
She also explained every issue in great detail and answered our quiestions paitently

tags: Value for money,
review: My baby was admitted to Motherhood Hospital, Indiranagar for phototherapy required for neonatal jaundice. Hospital charges Rs.2400/- (Rs.1200/- per day) for Dr. Deepa Mohan Sharma visit but she never visited ward during two days hospital stay.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was amazing experience. She is so himble n kind. Explain everything very clearly. Satisfying doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. deepa is really good and friendly. I went for my daughter for vaccination purpose and she explained us everything really well...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor asked all the right questions and prescribed medicines accordingly. I had met the doctor yesterday and I am already 70% better!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Deepa is very friendly,my baby was premature with very less weight by birth.handled very well and ********* *** *********Would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Too long time to wait. Nurse let someone who came after us. Doctor was good but the staff and appointment management was not so good...
